title: Master and Margarita
author: Mikhail Bulgakov
description: One hot spring, the devil arrives in Moscow, accompanied by a retinue that includes a beautiful naked witch and an immense talking black cat with a fondness for chess and vodka. The visitors quickly wreak havoc in a city that refuses to believe in either God or Satan.

title: The Elegance of the Hedgehog
author: Muriel Barbery
description: In a bourgeois apartment building in Paris, we encounter Renée, an intelligent, philosophical, and cultured concierge who masks herself as the stereotypical uneducated “super” to avoid suspicion from the building’s pretentious inhabitants.

title: The Elegance of the Hedgehog
author: Muriel Barbery
description: In a bourgeois apartment building in Paris, we encounter Renée, an intelligent, philosophical, and cultured concierge who masks herself as the stereotypical uneducated “super” to avoid suspicion from the building’s pretentious inhabitants.

title: Pachinko
author: Min Jin Lee
description: Yeongdo, Korea 1911. A club-footed, cleft-lipped man marries a 15 year old girl. The couple have one child, Sunja. When Sunja falls pregnant by a married yakuza, the family face ruin. But then Isak, a Christian minister, offers her a new life in Japan as his wife.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J. K. Rowling
description: Harry Potter wants to find out about the mysterious event that's supposed to take place at Hogwarts this year, an event involving two other rival schools of magic, and a competition that hasn't happened for hundreds of years.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J. K. Rowling
description: Harry Potter wants to find out about the mysterious event that's supposed to take place at Hogwarts this year, an event involving two other rival schools of magic, and a competition that hasn't happened for hundreds of years.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J. K. Rowling
description: Harry Potter has no idea how famous he is. That's because he's being raised by his miserable aunt and uncle who are terrified Harry will learn that he's really a wizard, just as his parents were. But everything changes when Harry is summoned to attend an infamous school for wizards.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
author: J. K. Rowling
description: In his fifth year at Hogwart's, Harry faces challenges at every turn, from the dark threat of He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named to the unreliability of the government of the magical world. Along the way he learns about the strength of his friends, the fierceness of his enemies, and the meaning of sacrifice.
